long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your YouTrack experience with this simple Chrome extension, designed to optimize text orientation for RTL languages. Key features:

Automatic RTL Support: Automatically applies Right-to-Left layout to designated elements in YouTrack.
LTR Override: Enforces Left-to-Right orientation for specific elements, ensuring clarity and readability.
Real-time Adjustment: Dynamically adapts to changes in YouTrack pages, maintaining consistent text direction.
A must-have tool for YouTrack users working with RTL languages!

תוסף המותאם למשתמשים הכותבים בעברית בשירות יוטרק
